trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element within a SAML assertion that contains an action on a specified resource.
The SamlAction class corresponds the `<saml:Action>` XML element which is defined in the OASIS SAML v1.1 specification.

Use the SamlAction class when specifying a claim about the ability of a subject <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> to perform a specified action on a specified resource.
Use the SamlAction class to specify the desired action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision> class to specify the access decision.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property represents that action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property specifies the XML namespace in which the action is defined.

SamlAction position in the SAML object hierarchy is: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> SamlAction
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class.

When using this constructor, to specify the desired namespace for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> statement set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property.
To specify the desired action, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class using the specified action.
The `action` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
The action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
action is .
-or- action is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class using the specified action.
The `action` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
The `ns` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property.
The action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
The XML namespace in which the `action` parameter is defined.
action is .
-or- action is .
Gets or sets the action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> can perform on the specified resource.
The Action property corresponds to the text of the `<saml:Action>` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
Gets or sets the action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
The Action property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
-or- The Action property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the Action property is set.
Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the IsReadOnly class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
Gets or sets the XML namespace in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*> property is defined.
The Namespace property corresponds to the `Namespace` attribute of the `<saml:Action>` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
The XML namespace in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*> property is defined.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the Namespace property is set.
Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element using the specified XML reader.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> XML element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that can read a <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions referenced by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> XML element.
reader is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
Writes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> into the specified XML writer as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element and its child elements and attributes that are defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
writer is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
